allow: Bash(# Simple benchmark echo ""fxi \(warm daemon\):"" time ./target/release/fxi ""fn main"" -l)

Bash(# Start fresh - restart daemon ./target/release/fxi daemon stop ./target/release/fxi daemon start sleep 2 # Test on chromium with simpler approach echo ""Testing fxi on chromium..."" ./target/release/fxi ""Browser"" -p ../chromium -c --no-color -n 1000 2>&1)
Bash(# Clean rebuild cargo clean cargo build --release 2>&1)
Bash(# Compare what files are being found echo ""Sample files found by rg but not fxi:"" rg ""nullptr"" -l ../chromium)

Bash(# Check if specific file is indexed echo ""Checking sql/recovery.cc:"" ./target/release/fxi ""sql/recovery"" -p ../chromium -l -n 10 echo """" echo ""Testing file filter:"" ./target/release/fxi ""nullptr"" -p ../chromium -l -n 10)
Bash(# Check file extensions being returned echo ""File extensions in fxi results:"" ./target/release/fxi ""nullptr"" -p ../chromium -l -n 1000)
Bash(# Clean file extension count echo ""File extensions in fxi results \(clean\):"" ./target/release/fxi ""nullptr"" -p ../chromium -l -n 5000)

Bash(# Let''s check the trigrams for nullptr # Also let''s see if we can find more files by using a different search method echo ""Testing exact match with quotes:"" ./target/release/fxi ''""nullptr""'' -p ../chromium -l -n 5000)
